alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Shawano; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 3:52AM CST until December 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 to 70 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Marathon, Portage, Waushara, Wood, Shawano and Waupaca Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Low visibility in fog will make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Thunderstorms will move through the area between 9 pm and midnight, and may produce even stronger wind gusts in localized areas.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. If driving in fog, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Portage; Shawano; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood
